languages.text: "Леди Теодора хорошо понимала мое значение в общем механизме корабельных служб". {n}К сожалению на лице хормейстера примешивается плохо скрываемое раздражение.{/n} "Впрочем, это не мешало ей пренебрегать моими предостережениями".

traits.locale_text:
"Леди Теодора хорошо понимала мое значение
в общем механизме корабельных служб". {n}К сожалению
на лице хормейстера примешивается плохо скрываемое
раздражение.{/n} "Впрочем, это не мешало ей
пренебрегать моими предостережениями".

languages.text: "Lady Theodora had a good understanding of my significance within the overall mechanism of the ship's services." {n}Poorly concealed irritation creeps into the expression of regret on his face.{/n} "Which, however, did not stop her from neglecting my warnings."
languages.original_text: "Леди Теодора хорошо понимала мое значение в общем механизме корабельных служб". {n}К сожалению на лице хормейстера примешивается плохо скрываемое раздражение.{/n} "Впрочем, это не мешало ей пренебрегать моими предостережениями".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora had a good understanding of my significance within the overall mechanism of the ship's services." {n}Poorly concealed irritation creeps into the expression of regret on the Choirmaster's face.{/n} "Which however did not stop her from neglecting my warnings."

"Lady Theodora had a good understanding of my significance within the overall mechanism of the ship's services." {n}Poorly concealed irritation creeps into the expression of regret on his face.{/n} "Which, however, did not stop her from neglecting my warnings."

"Lady Theodora had a good understanding of my significance within the overall mechanism of the ship's services." {n}Poorly concealed irritation creeps into the expression of regret on his face.{/n} "Which, however, did not stop her from neglecting my warnings."

languages.text: «Lady Theodora comprendía mi importancia en el mecanismo de los servicios de la nave». {n}Una irritación mal disimulada se añade a su expresión de arrepentimiento.{/n} «Lo que, por otra parte, no impidió que ignorara mis advertencias».
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora had a good understanding of my significance within the overall mechanism of the ship's services." {n}Poorly concealed irritation creeps into the expression of regret on his face.{/n} "Which, however, did not stop her from neglecting my warnings."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Theodora comprendía mi importancia en el mecanismo de los servicios de la nave». {n}Una irritación mal disimulada se añade a su expresión de arrepentimiento.{/n} «Lo que, por otra parte, no impidió que ignorara mis advertencias».

languages.text: 「シオドーラ様は、船で稼働するあらゆるシステムの中で、私の重要性をよく理解してくださった」{n}後悔の表情の中に、隠しきれない苛立ちがじわりと浮かぶ。{/n}「だがそれでも、私の警告を無視する彼女を止めることはできなかった」
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora had a good understanding of my significance within the overall mechanism of the ship's services." {n}Poorly concealed irritation creeps into the expression of regret on his face.{/n} "Which, however, did not stop her from neglecting my warnings."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ様は、船で稼働するあらゆるシステムの中で、私の重要性をよく理解してくださった」{n}後悔の表情の中に、隠しきれない苛立ちがじわりと浮かぶ。{/n}「だがそれでも、私の警告を無視する彼女を止めることはできなかった」

languages.text: “西奥多拉夫人很清楚我的服务对这艘船有多么重要。”{n}他的脸上露出了痛苦的表情，几乎无法掩饰怒意。{/n}“但即便如此，她还是对我的警告置若罔闻。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora had a good understanding of my significance within the overall mechanism of the ship's services." {n}Poorly concealed irritation creeps into the expression of regret on his face.{/n} "Which, however, did not stop her from neglecting my warnings."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉夫人很清楚我的服务对这艘船有多么重要。”{n}他的脸上露出了痛苦的表情，几乎无法掩饰怒意。{/n}“但即便如此，她还是对我的警告置若罔闻。”

languages.text: "Lady Theodora hat meine Bedeutung für den Betrieb des Schiffs sehr gut verstanden." {n}Unverhohlene Gereiztheit kriecht in seine reumütige Miene.{/n} "Was sie jedoch nicht davon abgehalten hat, meine Warnungen in den Wind zu schlagen."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora had a good understanding of my significance within the overall mechanism of the ship's services." {n}Poorly concealed irritation creeps into the expression of regret on his face.{/n} "Which, however, did not stop her from neglecting my warnings."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora hat meine Bedeutung für den Betrieb des Schiffs sehr gut verstanden." {n}Unverhohlene Gereiztheit kriecht in seine reumütige Miene.{/n} "Was sie jedoch nicht davon abgehalten hat, meine Warnungen in den Wind zu schlagen."

languages.text: « Dame Théodora avait conscience de mon importance au sein de la mécanique globale du vaisseau, {n}poursuit-il alors qu'une contrariété mal dissimulée vient se superposer à son expression empreinte de regret.{/n} Pour autant, cela ne l'a pas empêchée d'ignorer mes mises en garde. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora had a good understanding of my significance within the overall mechanism of the ship's services." {n}Poorly concealed irritation creeps into the expression of regret on his face.{/n} "Which, however, did not stop her from neglecting my warnings."

traits.locale_text: « Dame Théodora avait conscience de mon importance au sein de la mécanique globale du vaisseau, {n}poursuit-il alors qu'une contrariété mal dissimulée vient se superposer à son expression empreinte de regret.{/n} Pour autant, cela ne l'a pas empêchée d'ignorer mes mises en garde. »

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora, geminin hizmet sürecinde genel olarak ne kadar önem teşkil ettiğimi anlıyordu." {n}Çok da gizleyemediği rahatsızlık ifadesi, yavaşça yüzündeki pişmanlık ifadesinin yerini alıyor.{/n} "Ancak bu durum, onu uyarılarımı göz ardı etmekten alıkoymadı."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora had a good understanding of my significance within the overall mechanism of the ship's services." {n}Poorly concealed irritation creeps into the expression of regret on his face.{/n} "Which, however, did not stop her from neglecting my warnings."
